possible_values.flexible: Full refund 1 day prior to arrival, except fees
possible_values.moderate: Full refund 5 days prior to arrival, except fees
possible_values.better_strict_with_grace_period: Full refund up until 30 days prior to arrival. 50% refund of accommodation fee up to 1 week prior to arrival, then non-refundable.
possible_values.strict_14_with_grace_period:
Full refund within 48 hours of booking if before 14 days of checkin.
After, 50% refund up until 1 week prior to arrival
possible_values.super_strict_30: 50% refund up until 30 days prior to arrival, except fees
possible_values.super_strict_60: 50% refund up until 60 days prior to arrival, except fees.
possible_values.luxury_moderate: (Luxe only) Full refund up until 95 days prior to arrival, except fees.
possible_values.luxury_super_strict_95: (Luxe only) 50% refund up until 95 days prior to arrival, except fees.
possible_values.luxury_super_strict_125:
(Luxe only) 50% refund up until 125 days prior to arrival, except fees.
Only available for luxury listings
possible_values.luxury_moderate_14: (Luxe only) Full refund up until 14 days prior to arrival, except fees.

possible_values.CANCEL_LONG_TERM_FAIR:
To receive a full refund, guests must cancel at least 30 days before check-in.
If a guest cancels after that, you’ll be paid 100% for all nights spent, plus 30 additional nights.
If fewer than 30 days remain on the reservation when the guest cancels, you’ll be paid 100% for all of those remaining nights
possible_values.CANCEL_LONG_TERM_WITH_GRACE_PERIOD:
To receive a full refund, guests must cancel within 48 hours of booking, and the cancellation must occur at least 28 days before check-in.
If a guest cancels after that, you’ll be paid 100% for all nights spent, plus 30 additional nights.
If fewer than 30 days remain on the reservation when the guest cancels, you’ll be paid 100% for all of those remaining nights

possible_values.everyone:
Everyone who meets standard Airbnb requirements can make
Instant Book reservations.
possible_values.well_reviewed_guests:
Only guests who have traveled on Airbnb, are recommended
by other hosts, and have no negative reviews can make Instant
Book reservations.
possible_values.guests_with_verified_identity:
Only guests with verified government-issued ID can make
Instant Book reservations.
possible_values.well_reviewed_guests_with_verified_ident:
Only guests with verified government-issued ID
and who have traveled on Airbnb, are recommended by other hosts,
and have no negative reviews can make Instant Book reservations.
possible_values.off:
No instant bookings. Reservations will be made on request.
Must be whitelisted by Airbnb to use this option

offline_security_deposit.name: offline_security_deposit
offline_security_deposit.label: Charge security deposit on the PMS instead of Airbnb

possible_values.better_strict_with_grace_period: Full refund up until 30 days prior to arrival. 50% refund of accommodation fee up to 1 week prior to arrival, then non-refundable.
possible_values.strict_14_with_grace_period:

possible_values.super_strict_30: 50% refund up until 30 days prior to arrival, except fees

If fewer than 30 days remain on the reservation when the guest cancels, you’ll be paid 100% for all of those remaining nights
possible_values.CANCEL_LONG_TERM_WITH_GRACE_PERIOD:

If a guest cancels after that, you’ll be paid 100% for all nights spent, plus 30 additional nights.
If fewer than 30 days remain on the reservation when the guest cancels, you’ll be paid 100% for all of those remaining nights

possible_values.STRICT: 100% refund if reservation is cancelled at least 60 days before the arrival date
possible_values.FIRM:
100% refund if reservation is cancelled at least 60 days before the arrival date
50% refund if reservation is cancelled at least 30 days before the arrival date
possible_values.MODERATE:
100% refund if reservation is cancelled at least 30 days before the arrival date
50% refund if reservation is cancelled at least 14 days before the arrival date
possible_values.RELAXED:
100% refund if reservation is cancelled at least 14 days before the arrival date
50% refund if reservation is cancelled at least 7 days before the arrival date

possible_values.STRICT: 100% refund if reservation is cancelled at least 60 days before the arrival date
possible_values.FIRM:
100% refund if reservation is cancelled at least 60 days before the arrival date
50% refund if reservation is cancelled at least 30 days before the arrival date
possible_values.MODERATE:
100% refund if reservation is cancelled at least 30 days before the arrival date
50% refund if reservation is cancelled at least 14 days before the arrival date
possible_values.RELAXED:
100% refund if reservation is cancelled at least 14 days before the arrival date
50% refund if reservation is cancelled at least 7 days before the arrival date

possible_values.1: The guest will be charged the total price if they cancel.
possible_values.168: The guest will be charged 50% of the total price if they cancel their booking after reservation.
possible_values.115:
The guest can cancel free of charge until 42 days before arrival.
The guest will be charged 50% of the total price if they cancel in the 42 days before arrival.
possible_values.72:
The guest can cancel free of charge until 30 days before arrival.
The guest will be charged 50% of the total price if they cancel in the 30 days before arrival.
possible_values.68:
The guest can cancel free of charge until 14 days before arrival.
The guest will be charged 50% of the total price if they cancel in the 14 days before arrival.
possible_values.62:
The guest can cancel free of charge until 5 days before arrival.
The guest will be charged 50% of the total price if they cancel in the 5 days before arrival.
possible_values.55:
The guest can cancel free of charge until 2 days before arrival.
The guest will be charged 50% of the total price if they cancel in the 2 days before arrival.
possible_values.12:
The guest can cancel free of charge until 42 days before arrival.
The guest will be charged the total price if they cancel in the 42 days before arrival.
possible_values.121:
The guest can cancel free of charge until 60 days before arrival.
The guest will be charged the total price of the reservation if they cancel in the 60 days before arrival.
possible_values.13:
The guest can cancel free of charge until 28 days before arrival.
The guest will be charged the total price of the reservation if they cancel in the 28 days before arrival.
possible_values.14:
The guest can cancel free of charge until 14 days before arrival.
The guest will be charged the total price if they cancel in the 14 days before arrival.
possible_values.16:
The guest can cancel free of charge until 5 days before arrival.
The guest will be charged the total price if they cancel in the 5 days before arrival.
possible_values.29:
The guest can cancel free of charge until 2 days before arrival.
The guest will be charged the total price if they cancel in the 2 days before arrival.
possible_values.152:
The guest can cancel free of charge at any time.
No prepayment is needed.

fields.name: hours_after_booking
fields.label: Hours after booking
fields.description: Grace period - amount of hours after booking when free cancellation is available

fields.name: weeks_before_checkin
fields.label: Weeks before checkin
fields.description: Advance cancellation - amount of weeks before check-in when free cancellation is available

require_guest_address.name: require_guest_address
require_guest_address.label: Require guest address
require_guest_address.description: Specifies whether guests must provide an address.

require_guest_contact_number.name: require_guest_contact_number
require_guest_contact_number.label: Require guest contact number
require_guest_contact_number.description: Specifies whether guests must provide a contact telephone number.

guest_identification.name: guest_identification
guest_identification.label: Guest identification
guest_identification.description: Guests must show photo identification and credit card when checking in.

inform_arrival_time.name: inform_arrival_time
inform_arrival_time.label: Inform arrival time
inform_arrival_time.description: Guests must inform the property in advance of their expected arrival time.

key_collection.name: key_collection
key_collection.label: Key collection
key_collection.description: Guests must collect their key at a specified address.

pay_before_stay.name: pay_before_stay
pay_before_stay.label: Pay before stay
pay_before_stay.description: Guests must pay for their stay in advance with a bank transfer.

require_invoice.name: require_invoice
require_invoice.label: Require invoice
require_invoice.description:
If guests require an invoice when booking a prepaid rate,
                    they must write this request and their company details in the Ask a question box.

early_departure.name: early_departure
early_departure.label: Early departure
early_departure.description: In the event of an early departure, the property will charge guests the full amount for their stay.

pedestrian_zone_only.name: pedestrian_zone_only
pedestrian_zone_only.label: Pedestrian zone only
pedestrian_zone_only.description: This property is located within a pedestrian-only zone.

limited_parking.name: limited_parking
limited_parking.label: Limited parking
limited_parking.description: Parking is subject to availability due to limited spaces.

access_by_unpaved_road.name: access_by_unpaved_road
access_by_unpaved_road.label: Access by unpaved road
access_by_unpaved_road.description: This property is accessible via an unpaved road, which may be unsuitable for some vehicles.

onsite_functions.name: onsite_functions
onsite_functions.label: Onsite functions
onsite_functions.description: This property may host on-site functions and some rooms may be affected by noise.

residential_area.name: residential_area
residential_area.label: Residential area
residential_area.description: This property is located in a residential area and guests are asked to refrain from excessive noise.

busy_area.name: busy_area
busy_area.label: Busy area
busy_area.description: This property is located in a busy area and guests may experience noise.

no_public_transport.name: no_public_transport
no_public_transport.label: No public transport
no_public_transport.description: Guests are advised to bring their own vehicle as this property is not serviced by public transport.

prevent_likely_to_be_cancelled_bookings.name: prevent_likely_to_be_cancelled_bookings
prevent_likely_to_be_cancelled_bookings.label: Prevent likely to be cancelled bookings
prevent_likely_to_be_cancelled_bookings.description: Reduce bookings from customers that are very likely to cancel by showing them a modified version of your existing policies.

covid19_restriction_of_guests.name: covid19_restriction_of_guests
covid19_restriction_of_guests.label: Covid-19 restriction of guests
covid19_restriction_of_guests.description: Due to the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property does not currently accept guests from certain countries.

covid19_extra_cleaning.name: covid19_extra_cleaning
covid19_extra_cleaning.label: Covid-19 extra cleaning
covid19_extra_cleaning.description: In response to the Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are currently in effect at this property.

covid19_only_essential_travellers.name: covid19_only_essential_travellers
covid19_only_essential_travellers.label: Covid-19 only essential travellers
covid19_only_essential_travellers.description:
As per government guidelines to minimise the transmission of the Coronavirus,
                                this property can only accept bookings from essential workers and reasonable evidence must be provided upon arrival.
                                If reasonable evidence is notm provided, your booking will be cancelled upon arrival.

covid19_reduced_services.name: covid19_reduced_services
covid19_reduced_services.label: Covid-19 reduced services
covid19_reduced_services.description:
Due to the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff.
                                Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.

covid19_extra_documentation.name: covid19_extra_documentation
covid19_extra_documentation.label: Covid-19 extra documentation
covid19_extra_documentation.description:
In response to the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property may request additional documentation
                                from guests to validate identity, travel itinerary, and other relevant information.

covid19_reduced_facilities.name: covid19_reduced_facilities
covid19_reduced_facilities.label: Covid-19 reduced facilities
covid19_reduced_facilities.description: Spa and gym facilities at this property are unavilable due to the Coronavirus (COVID-19).

require_guest_address.label: Require guest address

require_guest_contact_number.name: require_guest_contact_number
require_guest_contact_number.label: Require guest contact number
require_guest_contact_number.description: Specifies whether guests must provide a contact telephone number.

guest_identification.name: guest_identification
guest_identification.label: Guest identification
guest_identification.description: Guests must show photo identification and credit card when checking in.

inform_arrival_time.name: inform_arrival_time
inform_arrival_time.label: Inform arrival time
inform_arrival_time.description: Guests must inform the property in advance of their expected arrival time.

key_collection.name: key_collection
key_collection.label: Key collection
key_collection.description: Guests must collect their key at a specified address.

pay_before_stay.name: pay_before_stay
pay_before_stay.label: Pay before stay
pay_before_stay.description: Guests must pay for their stay in advance with a bank transfer.

require_invoice.label: Require invoice
require_invoice.description:
If guests require an invoice when booking a prepaid rate,
                    they must write this request and their company details in the Ask a question box.

early_departure.label: Early departure
early_departure.description: In the event of an early departure, the property will charge guests the full amount for their stay.

pedestrian_zone_only.label: Pedestrian zone only
pedestrian_zone_only.description: This property is located within a pedestrian-only zone.

limited_parking.label: Limited parking
limited_parking.description: Parking is subject to availability due to limited spaces.

possible_values.flexible: 100% refund up to 14 days before arrival. 50% refund up to 7 days before arrival.
possible_values.firm: 100% refund up to 30 days before arrival. 50% refund up to 14 days before arrival.
possible_values.moderate: 100% refund up to 60 days before arrival. 50% refund up to 30 days before arrival.
possible_values.strict: 100% refund up to 60 days before arrival.
